studentSignUpPrompt: Student please sign up using the Sign Up option above.
forgotPasswordPrompt: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
resetIndicator: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email. Please check your inbox.
genericSuccess: If the account exists, a reset token has been generated. Please check your email.
resetSuccessMessage: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPasswordAnimationSubtitle: We'll help you get back into your account
readyToUseSubtitle: Your account is ready to use

errors.timeout: Request timeout. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.wrongCredentials: Wrong email or password. Please try again.
errors.accountDisabled: Account is disabled or not verified.
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.cannotConnect: Cannot connect to server. Please check your internet connection.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.default: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.tokenMissing: Reset token is missing. Please check your email link.
errors.tokenExpired: Reset token not found or expired. Please request a new password reset.
errors.invalidToken: Invalid reset token or password. Please try again.
errors.emailNotFound: Email not found. Please check your email address.
errors.tokenError: Registration successful! However, we couldn't generate verification token
errors.emailError: Registration successful! However, we couldn't send verification email. Please contact support or try to resend verification email.
